featured.text: Welcome poles were traditionally placed on village beachfronts to greet visitors arriving by canoe.

definition.zh_def: 位於海灘邊的，通常指靠近海洋的房產或地區。
definition.en_def: Located directly on or adjacent to a beach, typically referring to property or areas near the ocean.
definition.example: They bought a beautiful beachfront property for their summer vacations.
